issue.message: By convention, the declare-styleable (`InsettableFrameLayout_Layout`) for a layout parameter class (`LayoutParams`) is expected to be the surrounding class (`InsettableLinearLayout`) plus "`_Layout`", e.g. `InsettableLinearLayout_Layout`. (Various editor features rely on this convention.)

By convention, the declare-styleable (`InsettableFrameLayout_Layout`) for a layout parameter class (`LayoutParams`) is expected to be the surrounding class (`InsettableRelativeLayout`) plus "`_Layout`", e.g. `InsettableRelativeLayout_Layout`. (Various editor features rely on this convention.)

By convention, the declare-styleable (`InsettableFrameLayout_Layout`) for a layout parameter class (`LayoutParams`) is expected to be the surrounding class (`InsettableScrollLayout`) plus "`_Layout`", e.g. `InsettableScrollLayout_Layout`. (Various editor features rely on this convention.)
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Reflective access to setConfiguration, which is not part of the public SDK and therefore likely to change in future Android releases
Using internal inset dimension resource `status_bar_height` is not supported
Using internal inset dimension resource `status_bar_height` is not supported
Accessing internal APIs via reflection is not supported and may not work on all devices or in the future

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices

issue.message: This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 29. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `AppProvider` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `DatabaseManager` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
